A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I hated what they did with the characters. The story was boring and didn't make a whole lot of sense. Rey is a Mary Sue. The whole Canto Bight section of the movie could be eliminated without any effect on the rest of the movie. Just terrible. I've tried to give it more chances\, but I can't even make it through the movie when i try and give it a second\, third\, and fourth chance.
